summary:
Have you ever read a blog post that engaged you at every sentence and married you at the end of its last word? 

Well you are about to! 

I am that writer that holds your audience’s hands and captivates them while moving them to meaningful action. 

My skills are vast, but my focus is very clear: to create proven focused content in English with words as fierce as Beyonce. 

I cover four main areas;
Blog writing
Guest posting/ link building
Voice over recording for documentaries and commercials 
Editorial content for news websites and traditional print newspapers or magazines. 

I work a little differently to your traditional freelance writer; while I offer bespoke projects and work monthly for a handful of brands, magazines, and bloggers, I’m not here to just offer good spelling, grammar, and syntax. 

I want to ensure that your ideas and the 'big picture' are being communicated effectively.


GUEST POST & LINK BUILDING OUTREACH 

I have the privilege to guest post on high authority sites and can help you with your link-building. 

I write and post an article with a relevant, contextual link to your website, using a suitable anchor text. I use a few other links to authority sites (not your competitors’ sites) to make everything look professional and natural. 

Link-building helps to build your authority, improve your SEO and amplify your content.


NEWS WRITING
I have 12 years of experience as a Journalist. For most of it, I reported for media houses in Germany, the USA, South Africa, Uganda, Rwanda, and South Sudan. I can help you gather news, interview sources and craft both hard news and feature stories that are relevant, educative and informative. 

Here is exactly what you will get from me


I GUARANTEE; 

✔ You'll get content that is conversational and appealing to your readers 

✔ I work with a partner that edits and revises all content So, if my content doesn't leave you fascinated, tell me where you need it improved and we will revise it to your satisfaction. 

✔ If you need a news story or a news idea for your website/newspaper/Magazine, I will send you a complete story pitch. I will identify sources for an interview, conduct the interviews and write the news story just like in a traditional newsroom setting. 

✔ I promise 100% confidentiality. Your content is under your rights and won't be shared anywhere else 

✔ You get your work delivered on time, not even a second late.
